useCase.name: Take Exam
useCase.description: Allows a student to choose and take an exam.

preconditions.precondition: The student must choose an exam to take.

successEndConditions.condition: The student successfully presents the exam.

useCase.trigger: Student selects an exam to take.

mainSequence.step: Exam to be taken is obtained from the UI.
Exam details are retrieved from the repository.
Grammar tools are accessed to parse the exam.
Exam is generated using an external service.
Exam details are structured into a DTO.
Exam DTO is sent back to the UI for presentation to the student.
